metadata.title: CVE-2015-9541 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Qt through 5.14 allows an exponential XML entity expansion attack via acrafted SVG document that is mishandled in QXmlStreamReader, a relatedissue to CVE-2003-1564.

criterions.comment: qt4-x11: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
qtbase-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
phantomjs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
pyside: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
